description:
Hirata Hajime is the Officer in charge of the logistics section, he is the Chief Purser on the Yamato. He is a Lieutenant (or 1st-grade Space Lieutenant).
He is in charge of the logistic section, which manages supplies and material goods. The food supply system (OMCS) is also under his management. He has a calm character, joined the Navy at the same time as Kodai and Shima, and has a friendly relationship with them.
name: Hirata Hajime
